a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Life expectancy vs. health expenditure, 1970 to 2022
The period life expectancy at birth, in a given year. Health expenditure includes all financing schemes and
covers all aspects of healthcare. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between
Health expenditure per capita, PPP (international-$ in 2015 prices)
Data source: UN, World Population Prospects (2024); OECD Health Expenditure and Financing Database (2023)
Note: Health expenditure data is expressed in international-$ at 2015 prices.
